about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Take on the ultimate challenge and step into a new level of simulation. From the talent of TSG comes a new, greatly enhanced rendition of the DB BR 101 locomotive for Train Sim World®, complete with unparalleled, in-depth screen functionality, operational failures and of course, the IC Steuerwagen!

In the early 1990s, a majority of Germany’s express passenger services were operated by ageing locomotives, including the DB BR 103 and DB BR 120. Both had been hauling heavier trains than they were designed for, resulting in damage over time, poor reliability rates and rising maintenance costs. Germany was in desperate need of a new express passenger locomotive.

DB signed a deal with ABB which would develop into an order of 145 locomotives, with the first locomotive completed by July 1996. With ABB merging with AEG to form ADtranz, locomotives would be built quicker in multiple locations. The first of the new DB BR 101 officially entered service in February 1997.

In the subsequent 27 years, the BR 101 has proven itself to be a capable, high-speed passenger locomotive – working as the backbone of DB’s Inter-City services throughout Germany.

In Train Sim World®, TSG have taken the existing DB BR 101, originally released for Train Sim World 2, and transformed it into TSW’s first Expert/Study Level loco add-on! Rebuilt from the ground up, the DB BR 101 now features a full in-depth simulation including; overhauled physics, full internal simulation with machine room and all interactive fuses, temperature simulation, fault simulation, authentic PZB data entry, GSM-R and more.

Accompanying the BR 101 is the sleek and popular IC cab car! Built with the same level of simulation, the Bpmmbdzf 286.1 allows for fully authentic push-pull Inter-City services throughout Germany.

Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World®: Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim and/or Train Sim World®: Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa which are available as separate purchases. This is a standalone product and the original DB BR 101 is still available separately.

Key Features


  • BR 101 electric locomotive in DB Traffic Red and IC White liveries with expert level functionality:
    • Full internal simulation with all fuses and controls, including the machine room
    • Complete overhaul of physics, including temperature simulation with window demisting
    • A fault module to generate random faults for an additional challenge
    • GSM-R simulation, down to indivisual cell towers
    • True to life PZB data entry, switch between U, M and O modes with correct train length and speed data input
    • Optional easier mode for more accessible functionality
  • Brand-new Bpmmbdzf 286.1 cab car, built to the same functionality level as the BR 101
  • Updated Bpmmz and Avmmz coaches
  • Detailed Tutorials on the Training Center and a comprehensive manual available online
  • 3 Scenarios and an alternative timetable for Bahnstrecke Salzburg - Rosenheim
  • An alternative timetable that features the Expert 101 and cab car on Nahverkehr Dresden - Riesa
  • Explore Germany and beyond with the train in Free Roam
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 355.9 MB
